body.name: AMTOVO Fluffy Shaggy Rug Soft Plush Carpets for Bedroom Living Room Floor, Large Non-Slip Carpets for Kids Room Playroom 6'x9', Dark Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 20 mins
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 20 mins
features: Soft and comfortable: Made of high-quality polyester, the fluffy rugs are soft and comfortable to touch, providing a warm and cozy feeling for your feet. The shaggy design adds a touch of elegance to any room.

Non-slip bottom: The bottom of the rug is made of non-slip plastic material, which can effectively prevent the rug from sliding or shifting on the floor. It is especially suitable for use in areas with children or pets.

Versatile use: The rugs are suitable for use in various places, such as living rooms, bedrooms, nurseries, kitchens, offices, and dormitories. They can also be used as floor mats, pet mats, or as decorations for holidays.
Easy to Clean: Our rugs are easy to clean and maintain, just vacuum them regularly or shake them to remove the dust. They are also suitable for machine washing, making them more convenient to use.

Note Packaging: As the carpet is vacuum-packed, the fibers on the top of the carpet will not be fluffy enough when you first receive it, and there are some creases, which is normal. You can leave it flat for 2 to 3 days to smooth out the creases and wait patiently for it to recover. Please forgive us for any inconvenience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AMTOVO Soft Fluffy Shaggy Area Rugs Previous page Next page This soft and comfortable area rug made with high-quality materials, including polyester and cotton, it is durable and long-lasting, making it ideal for high-traffic areas
The shaggy design adds a touch of luxury and sophistication to any space, while the plush texture provides a cozy and relaxing feel underfoot.
Previous page Next page 1 Soft touch & High pile 2 Perfect Details
The bottom of the rug is made of non-slip PVC material, which has good anti-skid performance and can effectively prevent the baby from slipping and falling.
The size of the rug is 4 x 6 ft/5 x 7 ft/6 x 9 ft/8 x 10 ft , which is suitable for most rooms. It can be placed in front of the sofa, bed, desk, etc. to create a warm and comfortable atmosphere.
The modern design of the carpet adds a touch of elegance to your home decor. The color is simple and versatile, making it easy to match with various styles of furniture.

Why does the color received look a little different than the picture? The product color may look slightly different under lighting conditions. Is it machine washable? Yes, you can, but machine washing may cause a few fiber hairs to fall out, it's best to spot clean and scrub out stains with a mild detergent. How do I recover a crease in the carpet I received? Because our rugs are vacuum-packed and then shipped for a long time, it will cause the fiber hairs don't look fluffy enough when they are just unpacked. You can lay the carpet flat to rest 3-4 angels sponge recovery, the carpet will become fluffy. What if I just received a carpet that is not non-slip? Because the carpet is compressed, the sponge is not fluffy enough will lead to non-slip, please leave it to rest for 3-4 days will be restored. We also come with 4 anti-slip stickers for you to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! No fold lines from shipping.
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug! It is not heavy, but has a nice thick pile. It is ridiculously soft. Seriously, I usually go barefoot at home, and occasionally I go out of my way just to walk across this rug. The color is listed as dark gray, but I have found it depends on your surroundings. In a room decorated in neutral colors, it looks gray. In a room with a lot of blues, it appears a beautiful slate color with a hint of blue. It has a non-skid backing, which is very important to me.But here’s the best part: IT ARRIVED ROLLED, NOT FOLDED. Everything comes vacuum sealed now. I understand the concept, but some things don’t fare well folded up and vacuum sealed into a tiny little package. A smaller rug I ordered previously came folded in a square and vacuum sealed. It’s also a very nice rug, but it has obvious fold lines that are probably permanent. This beauty came vacuum sealed in a small package, but in a roll, not a square. When I cut the packaging away and opened it out, it was ready to go; no fold lines. Whoever packaged this rug is a genius.A beautiful rug that lays flat with no fold lines is an extra added benefit. But the number one selling point is the beauty and comfort of this rug. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this rug!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug!! It is so super soft. I have all wood floors and it feels nice to have a soft rug to put my feet on when getting out of bed. There are gripper dots that keep the rug in place. You can vacuum the rug easily. I got the light gray color so it will go with all of my comforter sets. It came vacuum sealed. Once I opened itand took it out of the plastic bag, it fluffed right up. I got the 5 ft by 7 ft and it fits next to my Queen bed very well. It dosen't shed and it's supper fluffy. This was a great pick!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this rug for our master bedroom. It is so soft and fluffy. I should have read the included instructions that states to lay it flat for 2-3 days to fully decompress before I put it in position. It should still be able to decompress. It’s 8x10’ so I really didn’t have an empty spot to lay for a few days anyway. I got the dark grey and love the color. It feels thin now but I’m sure that it will get thicker as the days go by. It says in the description that it is machine washable but the instructions that come with it state to only hand wash. It’s kind of big to put in a washer anyway. Our Labradors must love it because they laid on it instead of their thick pet beds. LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars soft and shaggy area rug that also feels thin and cheap
reviews.reviewText: As advertised, this area rug is soft and shaggy, but it is not at all “fluffy.” The main problem is that the deep pile is not thick or dense enough. The manufacturer photo that shows 1.7” high pile is a fantasy. The pile is indeed over 1.5” long, but it’s not as dense as shown in the photos and so it all flops over and is flat. So yes, it’s soft, but also very thin.Pros: * soft * inexpensive ($35 for 5x7) * spongy backing, like on a bathmatCons: * not fluffy * pile is not dense enough to stand up, as advertised * feels cheap, like a soft bathmat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit overpriced.
reviews.reviewText: Waiting 5 days before reviewing this item allowing the carpet fibers time to relax as per its instructions,to provide an accurate description.Arriving vacuum sealed in a small light box my first impression was that I received the wrong item,fortualy that wasn't the case.After reading several positive reviews about this product I decided to order one for myself.Remaining unused and laid flat for almost a week,left me feeling a bit disappointed.Unfortunately this carpet still doesn't appear super plush as depicted.The texture of rug itself is soft enough to the touch and looks nice from afar,emitting no foul odor,as opposed to other carpets previously ordered.However I was expecting something a bit thicker.Noticing that the other reviewers ordered this item in gray,depicting much thicker carpets in their images puzzled me.Failing to see a correlation between color choice and fiber count,consigning myself to the fact that,the one I received wasn't constructed as well,which does happen occasionally.Acknowledging the roulette game we play when ordering online products,I will cut my losses.Esthetically the carpet appears acceptable in its location,concurrently fluffing up a bit after resting,however not to the degree as seen in the advertised images.Having a soft feel it is nice to walk on,and with proper care it should endure much use.Sadly in my opinion it's a bit overpriced.Hopefully others fare better than myself,if deciding to make this purchase.Overall this is a very basic carpet best suited for those with mid-century modern decor.Unfortunately due to its mediocre craftsmanship,and after affording it every possible advantage,Im only able to rate it with three stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful light-weight, super soft, washable throw rug!
reviews.reviewText: 100/100I’m redoing my consulting room and wanted a nice, fuzzy, soft rug for it’s tactile-ness. Something soft and fluffy someone would love to sit on, roll around on, etc. THIS fulfills that role 100%!I also love that it’s light enough to easily put down and take up as needed. I admit that I usually leave it down, but if I need a more formal room, I can fold it, stow it out of the way and reveal the “fancy” rug beneath it . . . . then quickly and easily put the fuzzy rug back down.I can’t say enough about how much we love it. Even the color is perfect for the room!Ultimately, is it worth the price? Absolutely!
